meanings.definition: A synthetic herbicide used to control weeds in crops.
meanings.sent1: Farmers sprayed dalapon on the fields to kill the weeds.
meanings.sent2: The dalapon effectively eliminated the unwanted plants in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit tried to eat the dalapon, thinking it was a tasty treat.
meanings.sent4: The dalapon worked like a magic potion, making the weeds disappear overnight.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of dalapon lingered in the air long after it was applied.

meanings.definition: To treat with the herbicide dalapon.
meanings.sent1: The farmers dalaponed the entire field to ensure weed control.
meanings.sent2: It is important to dalapon the crops at the right time for maximum effect.
meanings.sent3: The gardener accidentally dalaponed the flowers instead of the weeds.
meanings.sent4: She dalaponed the garden with precision, targeting only the unwanted plants.
meanings.sent5: Dalaponing requires careful planning and execution to avoid harming beneficial plants.

meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the properties of dalapon to understand its composition.
meanings.sent2: The formula for dalapon is C3H4Cl2O2Na.
meanings.sent3: The students conducted experiments to create dalapon in the lab.
meanings.sent4: Dalapon, with its complex structure, intrigued the researchers.
meanings.sent5: The chemical structure of dalapon puzzled even the most experienced chemists.
